Name: Axe Specialization
Description: While using axes, gain +3  Weapon Damage.

Name: Berserker
Description: Gain 3% physical damage bonus for every 10% of your maximum health missing, up to a maximum of 30% physical damage bonus

Name: Carnage
Description: When a target is killed, gain 75 Armor Rating for 15s.

Name: Executioner
Description: While using axes, gain 10% Physical Headshot power.

Name: Iron Will
Description: Gain 75 Magical Resistance and ignore knockback effects. The maximum Magical Damage Reduction limit is increased to 75%.

Name: Morale Boost
Description: Recover 33% maximum health after killing a player.

Name: Potion Chugger
Description: Gain 20% potency towards all drinks, while reducing the duration by 50%.

Name: Savage
Description: While not wearing any chest armor, gain 10% Physical Damage Bonus.

Name: Crush
Description: Gain the ability to destroy unreinforced doors and containers. Also gain 1 Impact Power on your attacks with two-handed weapons to defeat blocks and parries better.

Name: Robust
Description: Gain 10% Max Health Bonus.

Name: Treacherous Lungs
Description: Increases the duration of all shouting abilities 30%.

Name: Two-Hander
Description: When attacking with a two-handed weapon, gain 5% Physical Damage Bonus and 5% Armor Penetration.

Name: Achilles Strike
Description: The next time you strike a target, inflict -30% Move Speed Bonus for 2.5s. While debuffed, each time the target moves they receive 1 Physical Base Damage.

Name: Blood Exchange
Description: For 12s, your attacks have 10% Lifesteal. In exchange, suffer -10% Max Health Bonus for the duration.

Name: Rage
Description: Gain 15 Strength, 15 Vigor, and 12% Move Speed Bonus.While active, lose 15% Physical Damage Reduction for 6s.

Name: Reckless Attack
Description: Gain 85% Armor Penetration on your next melee attack. While active, lose 85 Armor Rating.

Name: Savage Roar
Description: Frightens all enemies within a 7.5m radius, causing players to suffer -30% Physical Damage Bonus for 6s and forcing monsters to flee for 3s.

Name: War Cry
Description: You and allies within 7.5m gain 25% Max Health Bonus for 7s.

Name: War Sacrifice
Description: While active, gain 5 All Attributes for 12s. In exchange, suffer -10% Percent Max Health Healing over 12s.

Name: Adrenaline Spike
Description: When your health goes below 40%, gain 15% Action Speed for 12s.

Name: Barricade
Description: While in defensive stance, gain 50 Armor Rating and 50 Magical Resistance.

Name: Combo Attack
Description: When you successfully melee attack consecutively within 2s, gain 10% Physical Damage Bonus for 2s.

Name: Counterattack
Description: When you successfully block an attack, gain 10% Move Speed Bonus and 10% Action Speed for 3s.

Name: Defense Mastery
Description: Gain an additional 10% Item Armor Rating Bonus from equipped armor, and raise your Physical Damage Reduction cap to 75%.

Name: Dual Wield
Description: While you have weapons equipped in both hands, gain 10% Action Speed.

Name: Projectile Resistance
Description: Gain 10% Projectile Damage Reduction.

Name: Shield Mastery
Description: While in defensive stance, gain 10% Move Speed Bonus. When you successfully block an attack, gain 50% Action Speed towards your next block or attack.

Name: Slayer
Description: While holding a weapon in each hand, gain 5 Physical Buff Weapon Damage and lose the ability to equip plate armor.

Name: Swift
Description: Gain -30% Armor Speed Penalty Bonus. Not applicable to additional speed modifiers.

Name: Sword Mastery
Description: When using a Sword-type weapon, gain 2 Physical Buff Weapon Damage and 5% Action Speed. Also gain 10 Move Speed Add when taking a defensive stance with your sword.

Name: Weapon Mastery
Description: Gain the ablity to use any weapon. While using non-native weapon to your Class Requirements, lose -5% Physical Damage Bonus and -5% Magical Power Bonus on the weapon.

Name: Adrenaline Rush
Description: Gain 15% Action Speed and 5% Move Speed Bonus for 8s. After the duration ends, lose -8% Action Speed and -4% Move Speed Bonus for 2s.

Name: Breakthrough
Description: Remove and become immune to Debuffs that slow move speed, knockback, and gain 7 Move Speed Add for 12s.

Name: Perfect Block
Description: Gain 5 Impact Resistance for 6s.

Name: Second Wind
Description: Recover 40% Percent Max Health Healing over 12s. Additionally, Second Wind removes the negative effects of the Adrenaline Rush.

Name: Shield Slam
Description: When using a shield, perform a shield bash attack that actively blocks and deals 25 Physical Damage (100% Scaling) and decreases the victim's Move Speed Bonus by -20% for 2 seconds after knocking them backwards.

Name: Spell Reflection
Description: While blocking, gain the ability to reflect projectile and hitscan spells while also gaining 5% Magical Damage Reduction Mod. This buff persists until triggered, lasting 5s while active.

Name: Sprint
Description: Gain 3 stacks of Momentum, granting 15 Move Speed Add per stack. Lose 1 stack every 2s.

Name: Taunt
Description: Increases the aggro value to all monsters within a 7.5m area by 50%. Gain 12% Physical Damage Reduction and 12% Magical Damage Reduction for 10s.

Name: Victory Strike
Description: Your next attack within 10s deals an additional 20% Physical Damage Bonus. If the target dies from this attack, heal for 15% Percent Max Health Healing.

Name: Ambush
Description: When coming out of hide, you gain 10% Move Speed Bonus and 25% Physical Damage Bonus for 3s. If the melee attack is successful, the effect disappears.

Name: Back Attack
Description: When attacking a target from behind (roughly 120-135 degrees) gain 30% Physical Damage Bonus.

Name: Creep
Description: While crouching for at least 0.5s, reduce the volume of footsteps significantly.

Name: Dagger Mastery
Description: When swinging a dagger, gain 15% Physical Damage Bonus.

Name: Double Jump
Description: You gain the ability to jump an additional time in the air, but lose -10 Move Speed Add. After double jumping, receive a 75% Movement Multiplier until landing.

Name: Hide Mastery
Description: Increases the Hide skill duration to 1.5x and multiplies the cooldown by 0.7x.

Name: Jokester
Description: Grant self and all party members 2 All Attributes within 6m.

Name: Pickpocket
Description: Steal items from a chosen nearby enemy by using the "interact" key. Stolen item is chosen randomly from enemies inventory. Items currently equipped by enemies cannot be stolen. Additionally, your hide will not be revealed when you are bumped into. Items worn in utility slots do not appear on the waist. Pickpocket is not permitted in Arena.

Name: Poisoned Weapon
Description: A successful attack applies poison that deals 4  Neutral Magical Base Damage over 4s and causes the target to suffer -10% Incoming Physical Healing Mod and -10% Incoming Magical Healing Mod. The poison can stack up to 5 times at once and all stacks refresh when adding more stacks.

Name: Stealth
Description: While hiding, gain the ability to move 10 steps while crouching or slow walking. Also gain 3 Move Speed Add per remaining step.

Name: Thrust
Description: When swinging a dagger, gain an additional 20% Armor Penetration.

Name: Traps and Locks
Description: You can unlock locked locks without a lockpick and detect traps within 4.5m to disarm them.

Name: Caltrops
Description: Drops Caltrops at your feet that deal 10 Physical Base Damage and slows by -50% Move Speed Bonus to the next character that steps on them for 3s.

Name: Cut Throat
Description: When you successfully hit a target, silence them for 2s, disabling the target's skills/spells/performance abilities.

Name: Hide
Description: Become invisible for 8s. It is possible to change your equipment in this state. You are revealed when you attempt an action, such as moving, attacking, using a skill. Additionally, you will be revealed when you are bumped into. 2 Charges.

Name: Rupture
Description: The next successful attack causes the target to bleed for 20 Physical Base Damage over 5s. The Buff is consumed when an attack hits an object or target.

Name: Smoke Pot
Description: A smoke pot is deployed creating a smoke screen. The smoke screen lasts 12s and covers a 6m area. While an enemy target is within the smoke screen it slows them by -10% Move Speed Bonus.

Name: Tumbling
Description: When used, backtumbles in the opposite direction the player is facing.

Name: Weakpoint Attack
Description: When you successfully hit a target, reduce their armor rating by -40% Item Armor Rating Bonus for 3s. Only when melee attacking.

Name: Camping Mastery
Description: Gain 50% Regular Interaction Speed while setting up Campfires and increases the duration to 1.3x.

Name: Chase
Description: Detect recent enemy footsteps within 5.5m and can hear enemy footstep sounds from farther away.

Name: Crippling Shot
Description: Hitting the target's leg with a projectile inflicts -40% Move Speed Bonus for 1s.

Name: Crossbow Mastery
Description: While using a crossbow, gain 5% Physical Damage Bonus and an additional 50% Action Speed while reloading.

Name: Kinesthesia
Description: When moving with the bowstring drawn, receive a movement multiplier of 115%.

Name: Nimble Hands
Description: When using a bow, increases the animation's base draw speed by 15%.

Name: Quick Reload
Description: When reloading a bow-type weapon, gain 50% Action Speed.

Name: Ranged Weapons Mastery
Description: When attacking with a ranged (bow/crossbow) weapon, gain 5% Physical Damage Bonus.

Name: Sharpshooter
Description: When attacking with a ranged weapon, gain 15% Physical Headshot Hit Location Bonus.

Name: Spear Proficiency
Description: Gain the ability to equip spears. While using a spear, gain 5 Physical Power.

Name: Trap Mastery
Description: When installing traps, gain 100% Regular Interaction Speed.

Name: Back Step
Description: Quickly retreats 4m in 0.2s. It can also be used in the air. 2 Charges

Name: Field Ration
Description: Forage food and recover 25 Physical Base Healing.

Name: Forceful Shot
Description: When using a bow-type weapon, gain the ability to knock targets 2.5m back for 8s.

Name: Multishot
Description: When using a bow-type weapon, fire 5 arrows at once in cone shaped dispersion.

Name: Penetrating Shot
Description: Gain 50% Physical Headshot Penetration and 25% Armor Penetration for 8s.

Name: Quick Fire
Description: Gain an additional 50% Action Speed for 8s while using bow-type weapons.

Name: Quickshot
Description: Fire arrows in a quick succession. Each bow-type will fire a different amount of arrows.

Name: True Shot
Description: The next projectile within 8s is no longer affected by gravity and gains 8% Physical Damage Bonus.

Name: Purge Shot
Description: Removes all magical Buffs from a target on each successful hit with a ranged weapon for 8s. For each removed buff, you additionally deal 15 True Physical Base Damage.

Name: Arcane Feedback
Description: When you deal damage with an  Arcane spell, gain a stacking bonus granting 3% Spell Casting Speed and 3%  Arcane Power Bonus per stack for 7s. This skill can stack up to 5 times and the duration resets with each with each successful stack.

Name: Arcane Mastery
Description: Gain 5%  Arcane Power Bonus and reduces the cast time of  Arcane spells by 0.5s.

Name: Fire Mastery
Description: Gain 5%  Fire Power Bonus. The duration of applied burns are increased by 2 seconds and deal 2 more base damage (except Explosion Spell which gains 1/1), and burn the target to suffer -50% Incoming Physical Healing Mod and -50% Incoming Magical Healing Mod for 5s.

Name: Ice Mastery
Description: Dealing damage with  Ice freezes the target's feet and prevents them from moving for 0.5s.

Name: Ice Shield
Description: Gain 20 Armor Rating while not on cooldown. Inflict frostbite on melee attackers, causing them to suffer -20% Move Speed Bonus and -20% Action Speed for 0.5s.

Name: Mana Surge
Description: Gain 10% Magical Power Bonus.

Name: Melt
Description: When you deal magical  Fire Damage to a target, they suffer -20% Physical Damage Reduction for 5s.

Name: Quick Chant
Description: Gain 15% Spell Casting Speed.

Name: Reactive Shield
Description: When you take damage, gain a 15 Base Shield (0% Scaling) for 3s. The shield will reactivate after 12s.

Name: Sage
Description: Gain 10% Knowledge Bonus.

Name: Spell Overload
Description: Suffer -20% Knowledge Bonus but in turn, gain 60% Max Spell Count Bonus.

Name: Staff Mastery
Description: When using a staff-type weapon, you gain 2 Buff Magical Damage as Base damage.

Name: Arcane Shield
Description: Gain a 15 Base Shield (50% Scaling) for 12s. When the maximum amount is absorbed, the shield unleashes an Arcane Explosion, dealing 5  Arcane Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) to enemy targets in a 2m radius around you.

Name: Intense Focus
Description: Reduce the cast time of your next spell to 0.1s.

Name: Meditation
Description: Enter a meditative state and recover spells at a rate of 34 spell cost per 0.75s over 24s. While meditating you are also Resting and can benefit from Campfires

Name: Spell Memory
Description: Gain the ability to memorize spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Spell Memory II
Description: Gain the ability to memorize additional spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Advanced Healer
Description: Gain 5 Outgoing Magical Healing Add.

Name: Blunt Weapon Mastery
Description: While using a Mace, gain 10% Physical Damage Bonus.

Name: Brewmaster
Description: When you drink alcohol, you no longer exhibit the detrimental drunk effects and gain 10 Strength.

Name: Faithfulness
Description: Gain 15%  Divine Power Bonus. When a  Divine attack is successful, cause the target to suffer -15% Move Speed Bonus for 1.5s.

Name: Holy Aura
Description: Gain 15 Armor Rating and 15 Magical Resistance. This effects both yourself and allies within 6m.

Name: Holy Water
Description: Drinking any of the drinks will eliminate all removable curse effects.

Name: Kindness
Description: Heal yourself for 15% of the spell total heal amount when healing another character.

Name: Over Healing
Description: If the target would be healed for more than their missing health, the extra magical healing will be received as bonus health up to 20% of the target's maximum health. This bonus health decays at -2% Percent Max Health Healing per second.

Name: Perseverance
Description: Reduces all incoming damage by 2 Physical Absolute Reduction/2 Magical Absolute Reduction. Cannot reduce below 1.

Name: Protection from Evil
Description: Gain -30% Debuff Duration Bonus.

Name: Requiem
Description: Resurrecting an ally revives them with -50% HP lost. When reviving an ally at an Altar of Sacrifice, you do not sacrifice any of your own health.

Name: Undead Slaying
Description: Gain 20% Undead Race Damage Bonus.

Name: Divine Protection
Description: Receive the blessing of the divine and gain 30% Physical Damage Reduction for 4s.

Name: Holy Purification
Description: After casting for 1.5s, deal 100  Divine Magical Base Damage to all Undead Monsters within 7.5m.

Name: Judgement
Description: After channeling for 1s, instantly deal 25  Divine Magical Base Damage to a target within 5m and cause them to suffer -30% Move Speed Bonus for 2s.

Name: Smite
Description: When activated, your melee physical attacks deal an additional instance of 10  Divine Magical Base Damage for 7s. This new instance never benefits from Hit Location Bonus.

Name: Spell Memory
Description: Allows you to memorize spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Spell Memory II
Description: Allows you to memorize additional spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Charismatic Performance
Description: Upgrades a 'good' performance into a 'perfect' performance.

Name: Dancing Feet
Description: Gain 10 Move Speed Add when holding an instrument.

Name: Fermata
Description: Gain 5 Resourcefulness

Name: Jolly Time
Description: Drinking Ale recovers 5 Physical Base Healing (100% Scaling) and grants 10 Move Speed Add when drunk.

Name: Lore Mastery
Description: A high level of understanding of objects grants you 25% Regular Interaction Speed.

Name: Melodic Protection
Description: While playing songs, gain 30% Physical Damage Reduction.

Name: Rapier Mastery
Description: When a rapier is equipped, gain 2 Physical Buff Weapon Damage and 5% Action Speed.

Name: Reinforced Instruments
Description: Gain 50% Physical Damage Bonus when attacking with a musical instrument as a weapon. (This does not apply to Songs)

Name: Story Teller
Description: Give all party members within 6m 3 Will and 3 Knowledge.

Name: Superior Dexterity
Description: Gain 50% Item Equip Speed Bonus when switching between weapons/utility items.

Name: Wanderer's Luck
Description: Increases the chances of finding high-quality items when opening treasure chests by gaining 50 Luck.

Name: War Song
Description: Successfully performed songs grant 3 Physical Buff Weapon Damage to yourself and allies within 6m for 6s.

Name: Dissonance
Description: Creates an unpleasant noise to block hostile targets within a 6m area from casting spells, Silencing them for 3s.

Name: Encore
Description: The next song is automatically played to the end without any input and is sure to succeed. Gain 100% Manual Dexterity on this song, though capped to 50%.

Name: Party Maker
Description: Remove drunk effect from self and all allies within 6m.

Name: Music Memory
Description: Can store up to 5 sheet music as space permits.

Name: Music Memory II
Description: Can store up to an additional 5 sheet music as space permits.

Name: Dreamwalk
Description: When you take damage while in human form, gain 5 Magical Power for 3s and become spiritual, phasing through targets and becoming invulnerable, but being unable to attack and use skills while still able to cast spells. 18s Cooldown in the form of a Debuff.

Name: Enhanced Wildness
Description: While in animal form, gain 5 Move Speed Add and 10 Armor Rating.

Name: Force of Nature
Description: When Druid heals anyone (including self) and they are not at maximum health they gain 3 Physical Power for 3s on each tick of received healing.

Name: Herbal Sensing
Description: Detect nearby herbs.

Name: Natural Healing
Description: Heal yourself and nearby allies 1 Magical Base Healing (10% Scaling) every 3s.

Name: Shapeshift Mastery
Description: Allows you to change Shapeshift form instantly, bypassing cast time entirely.

Name: Spirit Bond
Description: You transfer 15% of Damage received by a party member within 6m to yourself, up to 20 damage per instance. 1s Cooldown in the form of a Debuff.

Name: Spirit Magic Mastery
Description: When you cast  Spirit magic, gain 10 Magical Power.

Name: Sun and Moon
Description: Nearby allies and self gain 3 Vigor and 5 Magical Power.

Name: Thorn Coat
Description: When melee attacked, return 5 True Physical Base Damage to the attacker.

Name: Lifebloom Aura
Description: Restores an additional 2 Health (0% Scaling) per tick to target when caster heals self or allies within 6m. Disables Shapeshifting.

Name: Shapeshift Memory
Description: Transforms one of 5 creatures, cannot use tools in non-human state. 6s Cooldown. Max 4 Charges which recover on cooldown.

Name: Shapeshift Memory II
Description: Transforms into one of 5 additional creatures, cannot use tools in non-human state. 6s Cooldown. Max 4 Charges which recover on cooldown.

Name: Spell Memory
Description: Allows you to memorize spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Apex of Sorcery
Description: While casting spells, move at 1% movement speed, but gain 50% Magical Power Bonus and 50% Spell Casting Speed.

Name: Mana Fold
Description: Your cooldowns are 0.75x as long, but suffer -15% Spell Casting Speed.

Name: Spell Merge
Description: While using bare hands, casting two combinable spells simultaneously allows you to use a new spell.

Name: Spell Sculpting
Description: Increases the range of all spells to 125% and the area of effect by 25%, but increase the Cooldown of your Spells that have a radial component to 1.25x.

Name: Spell Stride
Description: Gain 5% Move Speed Bonus while casting spells.

Name: Time Distortion
Description: All spell casting times are reduced to 0, but cooldown times are 4x as long.

Name: Sorcery Memory
Description: Gain the ability to use sorcery in the dungeon.

Name: Sorcery Memory II
Description: Gain the ability to use sorcery in the dungeon.

Name: Sorcery Combat
Description: Gain the ability to wield magical casting weapons in melee combat.

Name: Antimagic
Description: Gain 25% Damage Reduction against all Magical Elements except  Divine,  Curse, and  Neutral.

Name: Curse Mastery
Description: Gain additional base duration towards all curses you cast.

Name: Dark Enhancement
Description: Gain 10%  Dark Power Bonus towards dark magic spells.

Name: Dark Reflection
Description: While active, reflect 10  Dark Magical Base Damage (75% Scaling) to the melee attacker. Does not reflect while on cooldown.

Name: Demon Armor
Description: Gain the ability to equip plate armor. Suffer -10% Spell Casting Speed.

Name: Immortal Lament
Description: Casting spells will no longer take you below 1 health.

Name: Infernal Pledge
Description: Gain 25% Undead Race Damage Reduction and 25% Demon Race Damage Reduction.

Name: Malice
Description: Gain 10% Will Bonus.

Name: Shadow Touch
Description: Dealing physical damage to an enemy with melee weapon deals 2  Dark True Magical Base Damage and heals you for 2 Magical Base Healing (0% Scaling).

Name: Soul Collector
Description: When you deal the final blow to an enemy, one darkness shard is collected.

Name: Torture Mastery
Description: All curses inflicted upon enemies restores 2 Magical Base Healing (15% Scaling) to the caster with each instance of damage dealt. All spells cost 2x

Name: Vampirism
Description: Gain 20% Outgoing Magical Healing Mod.

Name: Blood Pact
Description: Assimilate the contracted demon after casting for 0.3s, and transform into a demon form (total transformation animation of about 3s). While in this form, gain an additional 50 Max Health Add (following the normal rules for temporary max health), 30 Armor Rating, Your entire body is covered in Abyssal Flame, taking -2% Percent Max Health Healing damage per second and dealing 2  Fire Magical Base Damage (25% Scaling) per second in 0.2s ticks to characters within 0.5m. You can move during the cast and transformation animations, but once started you can't use skills, spells, interact with objects, or cancel the transformation. Additionally, all Darkness Shards are consumed on cast completion, and you gain 1 All Attributes for each Darkness Shard consumed. When you become a demon, your skills change to demon-only skills: Unbind and Exploitation Strike. Your unarmed attacks also change (see Details below). and 30 Magical Resistance.

Name: Unbind
Description: Only available while Blood Pact is active, replacing the Blood Pact skill. Return to your true self, reverting the Pact's effects on you (aside from health lost to Abyssal Flame and Shadow Shards consumed) including the buff from Exploitation Strike (the max health loss Once started, you can move but the cast cannot be cancelled. follows the normal rules for temporary max health).

Name: Exploitation Strike
Description: Only available while Blood Pact is active, replacing the non-Blood Pact skill. Deal an additional 4  Evil Magical Base Damage (100% Scaling) over 4s to all enemies you hit with a physical attack within 4s and heals the caster by 5% of the target's maximum health, up to 20 per hit. Buff is immediately removed when Unbind cast finishes.

Name: Blow of Corruption
Description: Your next physical attack within 8s deals 12  Evil Magical Base Damage (75% Scaling) to the target and causes them to suffer -80% Incoming Physical Healing Mod and -80% Incoming Magical Healing Mod for 12s. Hitting an obstacle or a shield with the blade (not the hilt) counts as the next attack and will waste the effect.

Name: Dark Offering
Description: Channel your mind for up to 10s (), sacrificing -10% Percent Max Health Healing per 1s (()) to gain 5% Physical Damage Bonus and 5% Magical Power Bonus per stack, up to 10 stacks. This bonus lasts for 15s. All stacks are refreshed upon gaining a new stack.

Name: Phantomize
Description: Phase through melee attacks and projectiles and become untargeteable for 6s. While active, gain 5% Move Speed Bonus and suffer -50% Magical Damage Reduction. During this period you can only move and do not collide with other players or monsters, but are still vulnerable to AoE damage.

Name: Spell Memory
Description: Gain the ability to memorize spells to use in the dungeon.

Name: Spell Memory II
Description: Gain the ability to memorize additional spells to use in the dungeon.
